app.title: 7sanah
app.subtitle: The Islamic App
app.description: 7sanah is a free Islamic app that provides multiple services for Muslims. You can use it to determine the right time for prayer, search for the Qibla, read the Quran, view the Hijri calendar, and more.

khatmah.title: Khatmah
khatmah.description: Organize and track your Quran reading progress

calendar.title: Hijri Calendar
calendar.description: View Islamic calendar dates and events

qibla.title: Qibla Direction
qibla.description: Find the direction of the Qibla from your location

prayerTimes.title: Prayer Times
prayerTimes.description: Get accurate prayer times for your location

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.description: Calculate your age in Hijri calendar

tasbeeh.title: Digital Tasbeeh
tasbeeh.description: Keep track of your dhikr with digital counter

freeMode.description: Free mode allows you to count without any limit

quran.title: Quran Reader
quran.description: Read and listen to the Holy Quran

share.description: Share this Khatmah with others to invite them to join the Quran reading.

participations.noParticipations: You haven't joined any khatmahs yet.

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.text: This work is dedicated to the memory of the late Hajja Sabiha Thajeel (Umm Abdul-Baqi), my grandmother who taught me patience and faith, and was an example of giving and dedication. Her prayers were always with me in every step of my life. May her soul rest in peace.
dedication.reciteFatiha: Recite Al-Fatiha for her blessed soul

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For suggestions, feedback, or questions, please reach out to us at:

createKhatmah.title: Create New Khatmah
createKhatmah.subtitle: Start a new Quran reading khatmah
createKhatmah.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for your khatmah
createKhatmah.nameHelp: Choose a meaningful name for your khatmah
createKhatmah.nameError: Please enter a name for your khatmah
createKhatmah.typeHelp: Choose whether participants will read by Juz (30 parts) or by Surah (114 chapters)
createKhatmah.privateHelp: Private khatmahs are only visible to people with the link
createKhatmah.requireNameLabel: Require participants to enter their name
createKhatmah.requireNameHelp: If disabled, participants can join anonymously
createKhatmah.endDateHelp: Set a target date to complete the khatmah
createKhatmah.imageHelp: Add an image to make your khatmah more recognizable
createKhatmah.whatIsKhatmahText: A Khatmah is a complete reading of the Quran. Traditional Khatmahs divide the Quran into 30 equal parts (Juz), while Surah-based Khatmahs divide it into its 114 chapters (Surahs).
createKhatmah.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop an image here or click to select

editKhatmah.title: Edit Khatmah
editKhatmah.subtitle: Modify your Quran reading khatmah
editKhatmah.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for your khatmah
editKhatmah.nameHelp: Choose a meaningful name for your khatmah
editKhatmah.nameError: Please enter a name for your khatmah
editKhatmah.privateHelp: Private khatmahs are only visible to people with the link
editKhatmah.requireNameLabel: Require participants to enter their name
editKhatmah.requireNameHelp: If disabled, participants can join anonymously
editKhatmah.imageHelp: Add an image to make your khatmah more recognizable
editKhatmah.endDateHelp: Set a target date to complete the khatmah

prayerTimes.title: Prayer Times
prayerTimes.selectCity: Select a city from the list above
prayerTimes.locationError: Could not get your location. Make sure you have granted location access.
prayerTimes.mapError: Error loading map. Please try again.

qibla.title: Qibla Finder
qibla.subtitle: Find the direction of the Kaaba from your location
qibla.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please enable device orientation in your browser settings.
qibla.permissionNeeded: Device orientation access is needed to show the compass direction.
qibla.qiblaDescription: The Qibla is the direction that Muslims face during prayer. It points toward the Kaaba in Mecca, Saudi Arabia. This compass uses your device's orientation sensors and your current location to calculate the direction of the Qibla.

compass.title: Compass
compass.iOSPermissionNeeded: iOS requires permission to use the compass. Please tap 'Allow Access' below.
compass.notSupported: Compass is not supported on your device.
compass.calibrationNeeded: Compass needs calibration. Wave your device in a figure-8 pattern.
compass.calibrationTip: If compass direction is off, adjust it with these controls.
compass.holdDeviceFlat: 1. Hold your device flat and level
compass.moveInFigure8: 2. Move your device in a figure-8 pattern
compass.enableLocation: Enable location services to display Qibla direction
compass.grantPermission: To access this feature, permission must be granted
compass.deviceOrientationNotSupported: Device orientation is not supported on your device
compass.permissionDenied: User denied the request for Geolocation.
compass.positionUnavailable: The location information is not available.
compass.timeout: The attempt to obtain location has timed out.
compass.locationNote: Location needs to be enabled for the qibla to appear

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.description: Calculate your age in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars and discover more information.
ageCalculator.hijriExplanation: Your Hijri age differs from your Gregorian age because the Hijri year is 354.36 days while the Gregorian year is 365.25 days. There's a difference of about 11 days each year, which is why your Hijri age is greater than your Gregorian age, and this difference increases as you get older.
ageCalculator.birthdayDay: Your Next Birthday Will Be On
ageCalculator.calculationError: Error calculating age. Please try again.
